metadata.title: CVE-2017-5453 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
A mechanism to inject static HTML into the RSS reader preview page due to afailure to escape characters sent as URL parameters for a feed's "TITLE"element. This vulnerability allows for spoofing but no scripted content canbe run. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 53.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5453` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
